name: Drowned Gems
description:
Divers of all stripes love to look for jewelry under water and explore the vast masses of water, just like the hero of our story, who went on an adventure full of dangers in an underwater kingdom, where every fish can be the last in his life.

Drowned Gems is a 2d platformer game where the player in the underwater world shoots off fish scurrying in different directions and collects pearls that are scattered across the water levels.


Features of the game:
- Increasing complexity
- Unique traps
- Dynamic Music
